the Library of Virginia 53913

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Travis C. McDonald Papers, 1982-2023

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Travis C. McDonald papers, 1982-2023. Accession 53913. Personal papers collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Travis C. McDonald was the Director of Architectural Restoration at Thomas Jefferson's Poplar Forest in Bedford County, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Papers, 1982-2023, of Travis C. McDonald, Director of Architectural Restoration at Thomas Jefferson's Poplar Forest, located in Bedford County, Virginia. Records consist of materials written by McDonald about Poplar Forest and other aspects of historic preservation and historic sites. Also contains articles, reports, and other documents written by other authors and collected by McDonald regarding historic preservation and historic preservation sites.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p:
This collection is arranged
Series I: Travis McDonald and Poplar Forest, 1991-2023
Series II: Historic preservation and historic preservation sites, 1982-2009

did.unittitle: Series I: Travis McDonald and Poplar Forest, 1991-2023 1991-2023

scopecontent.p: Papers, 1991-2023, of Travis C. McDonald, Director of Architectural Restoration at Thomas Jefferson's Poplar Forest, which is located in Bedford County, Virginia. Records consist of materials published by the Corporation for Jefferson's Poplar Forest, including material written by McDonald; articles written about Poplar Forest by McDonald and published in other sources; and articles written about Poplar Forest by other authors. Also contains articles written by McDonald regarding other aspects of historic preservation and other historic preservation sites.

Series II: Historic preservation and historic preservation sites 1982-2009

scopecontent.p: Papers, 1982-2009, collected by Travis C. McDonald consisting of articles, appendices, brochures, emails, newsletters, pamphlets, photographs, reports, theses, slides and other documents documenting historic preservation and historic preservation sites in Virginia.
